description.p: Some in-place editing JavaScript functions have been renamed. This will affect uses using these functions in client-side scripts. You will need to update your JavaScript to use the new function names.

discussion.p: The *[js:<listObj>.editInPlaceAddRow()]* method has been changed to *[js:<listObj>.editInplaceAddRow()]* (lower case 'P') so that its is named consistently with the other editInplace* methods.
